TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs`1<T> extends System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs
Public Class RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs(Of T) Inherits RoutedEventArgs
generic <typename T> public ref class RoutedPropertyChangedEventArgs : System::Windows::RoutedEventArgs

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 已變更之相依性屬性的類型。

span.span: The type of the dependency property that has changed.

summary.span: 提供特定路由事件所報告相依性屬性值變更的相關資料 (包括所變更屬性的先前和目前值)。

span.span: Provides data about a change in value to a dependency property as reported by particular routed events, including the previous and current value of the property that changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是泛型類別的類別用於不同事件的事件資料的位置。This is a generic class where the class is used for event data of different events. 不同的路由的事件可以指定要產生的型別特有的事件資料類別的泛型類型條件約束。Different routed events can specify the type constraint of the generic to produce a type-specific event data class. 類別會受到限制，一旦和屬性也會反映這些型別條件約束; 因此，您可以針對不同的屬性變更事件使用常見的事件資料類別而不需要針對每一個可能的不同的委派屬性型別。Once the class is constrained, the and properties also reflect these type constraints; thus you can use a common event data class for different property changed events without requiring different delegates for each possible property type. 路由的事件的回報屬性變更，其中委派包含此事件資料類別包含，其中的類型條件約束 （和傳遞引數中的舊和新值） 是型別的，和，其中型別條件約束是。Routed events that reports a property change where the delegate incorporates this event data class include , where the type constraint (and old and new values passed in the arguments) is of type , and , where the type constraint is .

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: oldValue
param.span: 引發事件之前，屬性先前的值。

span.span: Previous value of the property, prior to the event being raised.

param.name: newValue
param.span: 事件發生時屬性的目前值。

span.span: Current value of the property at the time of the event.

summary.span: 使用提供的舊值和新值初始化 類別的新執行個體 (Instance)。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with provided old and new values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞的類型必須符合特定泛型宣告的條件約束。The types passed must match the declared constraints of the specific generic.

param.span: 引發事件之前，屬性先前的值。

span.span: Previous value of the property, prior to the event being raised.

param.span: 事件發生時屬性的目前值。

param.name: routedEvent
param.span: 這個引數類別具有其資訊的路由事件識別項。

span.span: Identifier of the routed event that this arguments class carries information for.

summary.span: 使用提供的舊值和新值與事件識別項，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, with provided old and new values, and an event identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳遞型別`oldValue`和`newValue`必須符合特定泛型宣告的條件約束。The types passed for `oldValue` and `newValue` must match the declared constraints of the specific generic.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub InvokeEventHandler (genericHandler As Delegate, genericTarget As Object)
protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);
override this.InvokeEventHandler : Delegate * obj -> unit

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定型別的方式呼叫的泛型處理常式。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 對其呼叫處理常式的目標。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為泛型處理常式然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這個實作模式和它的原因的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

span.span: Gets the new value of a property as reported by a property changed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值和類型條件約束將會建立建構函式。The value and type constraint of this property will be established by the constructor.

span.span: Gets the previous value of the property as reported by a property changed event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性的值和類型條件約束將會建立由建構函式的型別引數。The value and type constraint of this property will be established by the constructor's type arguments.
